EmailTemplate.name: Date Change Approval2
EmailTemplate.subject: {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Name}: Date Changes â€“ Request Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Account_Owner_Name__c},
Your date change request on {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.L1_Mgr_Approval_Start_Date__c} for {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Customer_Name__c}, customer number {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Owning_Customer_ID__c}, was approved.
For more information, including whether the request was modified prior to approval, please refer to Salesforce.com.
https://officedepot.my.salesforce.com/{!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Id}
Thank you!
